resources.string: Destacar casielles del tableru (últimu movimientu y xaque)
Destín de les pieces (movimientos válidos y antemanaos)
Llista de movimientos mientres la partida
Inicial (n\'inglés) de la pieza (K, Q, R, B, N)

string.name: zenMode
string.comment:
zenMode
This is not the religious meaning. Turning this option on takes away make elements of the user interface.
Can also translate as 'Focus mode' as one example.

resources.string: Amosar les puntuaciones de los xugadores
Amosar los emojis de los xugadores
Esto esconde\'l ELO en Lichess, pa ayudar a concentrate solo nel xuegu. Los xuegos por puntos van siguir afectando los tos ELO, esta opción ye solo pa lo que tu ves na plataforma.
Amosar el control de tamañu del tableru

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

string.name: gameBehavior
string.comment:
gameBehavior
In the user settings page, "Game behavior" is the title of the tab for configuring how the player can interact with the game.

resources.string: Faciendo clic na pieza y depués na casiella de destín
Arrastrando la pieza hasta\'l casiella de destín
Movimientos antemanaos (programar xugaes mientres xuega l\'oponente)
Mantén pulsiada la tecla <ctrl> al promocionar pa desactivar temporalmente la promoción automática
Cuando\'l tiempu restante sía de < 30 segundos
Puede desactivase mientres una partida col menú del tableru
Correspondencia y ensin llende de tiempu
Confirmar abandonu y ufiertes de tables

string.name: snapArrowsToValidMoves
string.comment:
snapArrowsToValidMoves
The 'arrows' are for quick annotations you can do on the board, by holding right mouse button. With this setting enabled, it means the arrows will align themselves to places were pieces can move.

string.name: sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
string.comment:
sayGgWpAfterLosingOrDrawing
When enabled, this setting will automatically send 'Good game, well played' to your opponent if you are lose or draw the game. It's meant as a courtesy message.
The message will be sent in ENGLISH.
It is up to you how to deal with this. For example, you may want to put '(message will be sent in English)' in your translated text as one example. Or you can leave the actual English text and put a brief translation in your own language.

resources.string: Dicir \"Good game, well played\" (Bona partida, bien xugada) al perder o empatar
Usa la rueda de desplazamientu sobro\'l tableru pa volver amosar los movimientos
Notificación diaria per corréu listando les tos partíes per correspondencia
Comentariu del foru que te menta
Tresmisiones a les que te suscribiste
Pocu tiempu restante na partida per correspondencia
Notificación de campana dientro de Lichess
Notificación de dispositivu cuando nun teas en Lichess

string.name: showClockOnTheLeft
string.comment: A setting. When enabled, the clock will be shown on the left side of the screen. Only applies to mobile devices.

resources.string: Amosar a la izquierda en dispositivos móviles
